brief_title: Apatinib Combined With Paclitaxel and Carbopatin Intensive Regimen in Neoadjuvant Therapy for Locally Advanced Triple-negative Breast Cancer
brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the efficacy and safety of Apatinib Combined With Paclitaxel and Carbopatin Intensive Regimen in Neoadjuvant Therapy for Locally Advanced Triple-negative Breast patients
